featured.text: Left-brained learners usually concentrate on memorizing les and lists.
It is a tune memorized in a personal way.
They should (A) encourage students to memorize rules.

definition.zh_def: 記住或學會某事，以便在未來能夠回憶起來。
definition.en_def: To commit something to memory for future recall.
definition.example: I need to memorize my speech for the presentation.
